KPIs_Activities_1.label: KPIs_Activities

parameters.text: By comparing the percent of time spent with percent of balance, you can see if you are spending time with customers proportionate to their value to the business. Ideally the blue and purple bars will be similar size.
Am I spending more time with high value or low value customers?
